A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I can’t believe this movie was even made. Terrible. Just utter garbage. At several times I almost got up and walked out\, but stayed\, hoping it would miraculously pull off a 180. “Hey here’s a great idea. Let’s remove the helmet of the main villainous character and leave it off for the entire movie. Oh and how about a shirtless telepathic Skype session? Have we done that yet in a Star Wars? Yeah\, let’s do that. Like a cheesy romantic comedy. Man. This is pure gold! Keep me coming guys” Star Wars Is DEAD
